D. Engineering, architectural and other fees for technical service

Engineering and architectural fees have been estimated on the basis of
69, of the total construction cost, to which has been added an estimated
amount of $18,720 to cover the cost of surveys and line and grade work
required during the entire construction period, and also the cost of special
inspection work.



Engineering and Architectural Fees............ ... .. ... ... ... ... ...... $251,280
Surveys, Line and Grade Work, Special Inspection Work.................... 18,720
Total engineering, architectural and other fees for technical service. . . . ... $270,000

E. Legal, administrative, and overhead costs

The legal, administrative and overhead expenses, herein listed, are in-
tended to cover the expenses of the State Roads Commission during the
entire construction period, from the beginning of preliminary work to the
completion of the bridge and the closing out of the construction fund.

Total legal, administrative, and overhead costs......... $40,000

Alternate Design

Since the completion of the engineering work, upon which the estimated
cost herein presented is based, J. E. Greiner Company has investigated the
possible use of determinate continuous spans of a patented type, instead
of the indeterminate continuous truss spans estimated herein. The arrange-
ment of the spans, in case such determinate continuous truss type is used.
will be somewhat different from the arrangement shown for this bridge in
Volume IT, “Plates’”’. The question of the use of this alternate truss type has
been taken up with the Commission, and, when so authorized, J. E. Greiner
Company will submit a supplemental report to cover the results of the
further investigations. Present indications are that the use of statically
